negotiator.boaframework.offeringstrategy.anac2013

Class InoxAgent_Offering_OneIssue

  • java.lang.Object
    • genius.core.boaframework.BOA
      • genius.core.boaframework.OfferingStrategy
        • negotiator.boaframework.offeringstrategy.anac2013.InoxAgent_Offering_OneIssue

  • public class InoxAgent_Offering_OneIssue
extends OfferingStrategy
    This class implements a simple strategy for a single issue domain. The utility of offers that are being generated slowly decline to the utility of the median bid between our best bid and the opponent's first bid.
    Author:
    Ruben van Zessen, Mariana Branco
